thread.title: Jessica Ambriz
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Jessica Ambriz

author: Jessica Ambriz
title: Jessica Ambriz
text: I had been looking for a storage unit near my new apartment, although there were closer companies to my apartment I'm glad I went with Public Storage. The website had so much information from figuring out what size to get to helpful and entertaining videos on tips and tricks. When I went in to sign my paperwork they took me to see the locker to make sure the size I had picked was just the right size. They were so friendly and helpful that I just knew I picked the right company to work with. The facility was clean and well lit.
